plot outline: Navya and Naveen are two youngsters who are family friends and have finished BTech. When their families decide to get them engaged, they go on a getaway to Nandi Hills to understand each other and their likes better. Does this prove to be more than what they were expecting?
title: Ibbaru B.Tech Students Journey - IMDb
production companies: Shree Shivani Arts and P.S. Movie Makers
plot: Navya and Naveen are two youngsters who are family friends and have finished BTech. When their families decide to get them engaged, they go on a getaway to Nandi Hills to understand each other and their likes better. Does this prove to be more than what they were expecting?::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
